squidpony.squidmath

Class Voronoi

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidmath.Voronoi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Voronoi
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Java implementation of both a 2D Delaunay triangulation algorithm and a Voronoi polygon data structure. This is a port of Johannes Diemke's code, with modifications suggested by Amit Patel to consolidate the triangles with a barycentric dual mesh.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Voronoi()
      Constructs a triangulator instance but does not insert any points; you should add points to getPointSet() before running triangulate().
      Voronoi(OrderedSet<CoordDouble> pointSet)
      Constructs a new triangulator instance using the specified point set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OrderedSet<CoordDouble> getPointSet()
      Returns the point set in form of a vector of 2D vectors.
      java.util.ArrayList<Voronoi.Triangle> getTriangles()
      Returns the triangles of the triangulation in form of a list of 2D triangles.
      java.util.ArrayList<Voronoi.Polygon> polygonize() 
      void reorder(int[] permutation)
      Shuffles the point set using a custom permutation sequence.
      void shuffle(IRNG rng)
      Creates a random permutation of the specified point set.
      java.util.ArrayList<Voronoi.Triangle> triangulate()
      This method generates a Delaunay triangulation from the specified point set.

      • Voronoi

        public Voronoi()
        Constructs a triangulator instance but does not insert any points; you should add points to getPointSet() before running triangulate().

      • Voronoi

        public Voronoi(OrderedSet<CoordDouble> pointSet)
        Constructs a new triangulator instance using the specified point set.
        Parameters:
        pointSet - The point set to be triangulated

    • Method Detail

      • triangulate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Voronoi.Triangle> triangulate()
        This method generates a Delaunay triangulation from the specified point set.

      • polygonize

        public java.util.ArrayList<Voronoi.Polygon> polygonize()

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle(IRNG rng)
        Creates a random permutation of the specified point set. Based on the implementation of the Delaunay algorithm, this can speed up the computation.

      • reorder

        public void reorder(int[] permutation)
        Shuffles the point set using a custom permutation sequence.
        Parameters:
        permutation - The permutation used to shuffle the point set

      • getPointSet

        public OrderedSet<CoordDouble> getPointSet()
        Returns the point set in form of a vector of 2D vectors.
        Returns:
        Returns the points set.

      • getTriangles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Voronoi.Triangle> getTriangles()
        Returns the triangles of the triangulation in form of a list of 2D triangles.
        Returns:
        Returns the triangles of the triangulation.
